title: CISA Calls Urgent Attention to UEFI Attack Surfaces
description:
The US government's cybersecurity agency describes UEFI as "critical attack surface" that requires urgent security attention.

The post CISA Calls Urgent Attention to UEFI Attack Surfaces appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Jericho Security Raises $3 Million for Awareness Training Powered by Generative AI
description:
Jericho Security raises $3 million in a pre-seed funding round to help organizations defend against emerging generative AI-powered phishing attacks.

The post Jericho Security Raises $3 Million for Awareness Training Powered by Generative AI appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: 670 ICS Vulnerabilities Disclosed by CISA in First Half of 2023: Analysis
description:
CISA disclosed 670 ICS vulnerabilities in the first half of 2023, but roughly one-third have no patches or mitigations from the vendor.

The post 670 ICS Vulnerabilities Disclosed by CISA in First Half of 2023: Analysis appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Dozens of RCE Vulnerabilities Impact Milesight Industrial Router
description:
Cisco Talos researchers warn of dozens of critical- and high-severity vulnerabilities in the Milesight UR32L industrial router leading to code execution.

The post Dozens of RCE Vulnerabilities Impact Milesight Industrial Router appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: These Are the Top Five Cloud Security Risks, Qualys Says
description:
Cloud security specialist Qualys has provided its view of the top five cloud security risks, drawing insights and data from its own platform and third parties.

The post These Are the Top Five Cloud Security Risks, Qualys Says appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Decommissioned Medical Infusion Pumps Expose Wi-Fi Configuration Data
description:
Medical infusion pumps available via secondary market sources contain Wi-Fi configuration settings from the original organization.

The post Decommissioned Medical Infusion Pumps Expose Wi-Fi Configuration Data appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Cybersecurity M&A Roundup: 42 Deals Announced in July 2023
description:
Forty-two cybersecurity-related merger and acquisition (M&A) deals were announced in July 2023.

The post Cybersecurity M&A Roundup: 42 Deals Announced in July 2023 appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Google Awards Over $60,000 for V8 Vulnerabilities Patched With Chrome 115 Update
description:
Google has paid out over $60,000 for three high-severity type confusion vulnerabilities in Chrome’s V8 engine.

The post Google Awards Over $60,000 for V8 Vulnerabilities Patched With Chrome 115 Update appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Salesforce Email Service Zero-Day Exploited in Phishing Campaign
description:
Threat actors have exploited a Salesforce email service zero-day vulnerability and abused Meta features in a sophisticated phishing campaign.

The post Salesforce Email Service Zero-Day Exploited in Phishing Campaign appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Software Supply Chain Startup Endor Labs Scores Massive $70M Series A Round
description:
Endor Labs has closed a massive $70 million Series A round of financing to fuel ambitious plans to build a dependency lifecycle management platform.  

The post Software Supply Chain Startup Endor Labs Scores Massive $70M Series A Round appeared first on SecurityWeek.
